name: Puzzle Maker
description:
“Puzzle Maker” is a game in which you can create your own puzzles from pictures. Also play one of 40 ready-made animated puzzles, sometimes containing interactive objects.

The game has a lot of room for customization. The settings will help you change the gameplay to suit your tastes. You can change the shape of the borders and the puzzle type to square and polygonal. Add effects to the picture, change the size of the playing field.

A customized insertion and hint system will help you assemble pictures. It is possible to combine pieces with each other before inserting them into the correct place in the puzzle.

A user-friendly interface and beautiful music will allow you to focus on collecting puzzles and enjoy making pictures.

Game Features:
  • Feature to creating your own puzzles
  • 40 built-in animated puzzles. It is possible to disable animation
  • 5 difficulty levels
  • Customization of pieces
  • Hint system
  • Ability to add effects
  • Game settings - screen resolution, music volume, changing the color theme of the game
